keyword: how many calories in donuts krispy kreme
title: How Many Calories in Krispy Kreme Donuts?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in donuts Krispy Kreme style, focusing on the original glazed variety, with full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your donut cravings.
h1: How Many Calories in Krispy Kreme Donuts?
assumptions: Original glazed donut, standard size (~52 g), fresh from the store; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, freshness, and preparation; Krispy Kreme values may differ slightly by location. Check official sources or packaging.

quick_answer.text: One Krispy Kreme original glazed donut contains about 190 calories, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Krispy Kreme donut?
faqs.a: About 190 calories for the original glazed donut.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Krispy Kreme donuts?
faqs.a: One original glazed has 22 g total carbs, including 10 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Krispy Kreme donut?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat per donut, with 5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Do Krispy Kreme donuts have protein?
faqs.a: Minimalâ€”about 2 g protein per original glazed donut.

faqs.q: Calories in a dozen Krispy Kreme donuts?
faqs.a: Approximately 2,280 calories for 12 original glazed donuts (190 kcal each).
